name: alinex-admin-client
description: Fast and easy web administration panel for IT
author: Alexander Schilling <info@alinex.de>

scripts.build: quasar build; quasar build -m electron -T all; tar -C dist/electron-mat -czvf dist/electron-mat/Administration-Panel-linux-x64.tgz Administration-Panel-linux-x64; tar -C dist/electron-mat -czvf dist/electron-mat/Administration-Panel-darwin-x64.tgz Administration-Panel-darwin-x64; cd dist/electron-mat; zip -r Administration-Panel-win32-x64.zip Administration-Panel-win32-x64/
